resources.string: Hi Ladies and Gents! I hope you will enjoy the quiz :))
1. What is the name of a \"female\" nursing aid robot? The robot was built by Toyota, as part of their Partner Robot Family, a line of robots to take care of world\'s growing geriatric population.
2. What is the future of cancer treatment? Select all that apply.
3. Which of the following are the names of cryptocurrencies? Select all that apply.
4. What will be possible for machine translation in 2025? Select only one option.
Genome sequencing that can identify genetic mutation, so the appropriate treatment can be applied.
A liquid biopsy in which a blood sample is taken and tested for the presence of even the tiniest amount of tumor DNA.
Robots temporarily inserted in human body that emit radiations into cancer cells with pinpoint accuracy, without damaging healthy living tissues.

Having a dinner with eight people at the table speaking eight different languages and the voice in your ear will always be whispering the one language you want to hear recreating the voice of the speaking person.

Having a dinner with eight people at the table speaking eight different languages and the voice in your ear will always be whispering the one language you want to hear, but the voice in your ear will be a computer voice.
Having a dinner with eight people at the table speaking only two different languages and the voice in your ear will always be whispering the one language you want to hear.
